LanguageData.JRWKosmoceratopsReconstruct.label: Kosmoceratops
LanguageData.JRWKosmoceratopsReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #07822-2010 [KOSMOCERATOPS RICHARDSONI] CODENAME: ORNAMENT >777
A chasmosaurine ceratopsian with an incredible display frill on their crest. Known amusingly as 'the horniest dinosaur ever discovered' they have a whopping fifteen horn like structures on their face.
